name: Belgian Waffles
instructions: Preheat waffle iron an spray with oil or coat with butter
In a large bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, and cinnamon
In a medium bowl, beat egg whites until stiff peaks from
In another medium bowl, mix together, egg yolks, oil, milk, and vanilla extract
Add egg yolk mixture to dry ingredients and mix well
Pour batter into hot waffle iron and cook until done, as per manufacturer’s directions
Serve with butter, syrup, powdered sugar, or fruit.

additional_context.story: Tori's friend from university, Ada, made waffles for everyone and added cardamom which is the norwegian way of waffles! They were delicious!
